Text.Page: You assisted the Consos Clan with the temple by rekindling the Flames of Sacrifice, Honor, and Mercy.

Under the name of Balder! I am Modan.

It is my duty to maintain the Flames of Balder, so that all who visit the temple might reflect upon his nobility.

, would you like to take charge of my duties for a short time? "It would be an honor."

Visit each of the three flames, in turn. Ensure that they are burning, and do not lack for fuel.

Spend as much time at each flame as you like; think about what Balder's sacrifice, honor, and mercy mean to you. When you have seen to each of the three flames, return to me here.
The Flame of Sacrifice is burning brightly.
The Flame of Honor is burning properly.
The Flame of Mercy is burning warmly.

Thank you for your work. I trust you feel closer to Balder now?

Ah, I had almost forgotten. Please accept these small tokens of the Consos Clan's appreciation.
